contents.text: Thank you for calling Elastic.co in San Francisco, the leader in B2B developer tools for search and analytics.
To explore a 14-day free trial of our services, press '1'.
To start a trial of our Elasticsearch Service, press '1'.
Please hold while we activate your Elasticsearch Service trial.

navigationGoals: Set up a free Elasticsearch Service trial to quickly benchmark its search performance.
As a veteran working on a personal project, I want to spin up a 14-day Elasticsearch trial to evaluate its search features.
I want to spin up a 14-day Elasticsearch Service trial in the cloud.
Activate the Elasticsearch Service free trial for me.
I’d like to start a 14-day Elasticsearch Service trial to index and search my physics experiment data.

contents.text: For a trial of our App Search or Site Search Service, press '2'.
Please hold while we activate your App Search or Site Search trial.

navigationGoals: Activate a trial of App Search to evaluate how it integrates with our web portal.
I’m building a community forum and need to try your App Search/Site Search service before committing.
I'd like to initiate a trial for App Search to test its API integration.
Set up a free trial of the App Search or Site Search service.
I want to try the App Search Service to add advanced search to the web portal for my research project.

contents.text: To speak with a sales specialist, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: Speak with a sales specialist about enterprise pricing and volume discounts.
I’d like to discuss enterprise pricing and deployment options with a sales specialist.
Connect me to a sales specialist to discuss enterprise licensing options.
Put me through to a sales specialist to discuss service options.
I need to speak with a sales specialist about subscription pricing for deploying Elastic in our university lab.

contents.text: To connect with technical support, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Get help troubleshooting slow queries in my existing Elasticsearch deployment.
I’m encountering an issue with my account and need to speak with technical support.
I need to talk to technical support to debug my search cluster.
Connect me with technical support for assistance.
I need technical support configuring index mappings in my Elasticsearch cluster for my thesis work.
